definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

pinyin: Xi1 zang4 Bai3 wan4 Nong2 nu2 Jie3 Fang4 Ji4 nian4 ri4
containing_words.word: 西藏百萬農奴解放紀念日

pinyin: zhen4 wang2 zhan4 shi4 ji4 nian4 ri4

sentences.english: Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 小王在結婚紀念日送給妻子一束玫瑰花。

sentences.english: Lincoln's Birthday is commemorated every year in his hometown of Hodgenville.
sentences.chinese: 林肯紀念日每年都會在他的故鄉霍金維爾被慶祝。

sentences.english: Do you remember Leifeng? Today is the memorial day of learning from Leifeng.
sentences.chinese: 還記得雷鋒嗎？今天是學習雷鋒同志紀念日。

sentences.english: Tommorrow is the memorial date of the foundind of Chinese Communist Party, but it's rarely reminded.
sentences.chinese: 明天是建黨的紀念日，但幾乎沒有被提起。

sentences.english: I wish you many more anniversaries each happier than thelast.
sentences.chinese: 願你們有更多週年紀念日，一年比一年更幸福。

sentences.english: Our family celebrated my grandparents' golden wedding anniversary in a big way last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期日，我家隆重慶祝了我祖父母的金婚紀念日。

sentences.english: London's Big Ben celebrates the 150th anniversary of its first chiming on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 本週六，倫敦的大本鐘迎來了它150歲的紀念日。

sentences.english: Glen and Lorraine just celebrated their diamond anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 格倫和洛蘭剛剛慶祝了他們的鑽石婚紀念日。

sentences.english: When is your parents wedding anniversary?
sentences.chinese: 你父母的娶親紀念日是在哪天？

sentences.english: I am dancing with my father at my parents' 50th-wedding-anniversary celebration.
sentences.chinese: 在父母五十週年結婚紀念日那天我與父親跳舞了。

sentences.english: Today is the 1000th memorial day for my husband and me.
sentences.chinese: 明天是我和老公的1000天紀念日。

sentences.english: "It's a special anniversary of creation, " said David Stuart, a specialist in Mayan epigraphy at the University of Texas at Austin.
sentences.chinese: 那是創造的特殊週年紀念日。

sentences.english: Personal diary shows our anniversary and a reminder to get a present for my wife.
sentences.chinese: 個人日記顯示出我們紀念日並提醒我爲妻子買禮物。

sentences.english: This Anniversary Day I plan to wake early.
sentences.chinese: 今年的結婚週年紀念日我打算早點醒來。

sentences.english: Today is our golden wedding anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我們的金婚紀念日。

sentences.english: The White House made no comment Friday on the anniversary of the start of the war.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，白宮對伊戰開戰紀念日無任何評論。

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
to sign (one's name with a pen etc)/to autograph/signature
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
